title: Mayn River, Siberia
description:
The Mayn River, seen here with what is thought to be a portion of the Anadyr River, flows through the far northeastern corner of Siberia.
This is a natural color composite image made using red, green, and blue wavelengths. The image has also been sharpened using the sensor's panchromatic band.
